quest.name: Always Wear Protection
journal:
Managingway is thinking it may be time to suit up.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Managingway.
objectives: Speak with Protectingway in Bestways Burrow.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ah, just the person I was looking for. Another bright-eyed dreamer has come to me seeking help─Protectingway.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Her dream is to see that all Loporrit-kind enjoy a long and healthy life abrim with safety. At present, she's hard at work on an invention to protect us from parasitic fungal spores─and the infectious diseases they can induce. Nasty stuff.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: The moon's surface is full of all sorts of perils─inhale even one stray spore and we could find ourselves with a runny nose, rashes all over, or heavens, even loss of fur! If she can find some way to prevent such travesties from occurring, I for one would welcome it.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename. Do you have a moment to spare? Protectingway has requested your aid once again.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: It seems her invention─the parasital infection protection suit, or PIPS for short─works, and now she wishes to bolster its production.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: For the sake of all Loporrits present and─well, present, I ask that you meet her in Bestways Burrow, and assist her with the production of this invaluable device.

dialogue.name: PROTECTINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ah, hello there! I take it Managingway sent you here to assist me. Your help is much appreciated!

dialogue.name: PROTECTINGWAY
dialogue.text: As Managingway undoubtedly informed you, I'm constructing a suit designed to shield the wearer from infectious spores. Unfortunately, I'm short on deft paws able to craft the most essential components─or rather I was, until you came.

dialogue.name: PROTECTINGWAY
dialogue.text: It would be wonderful if you could use these spare metal parts to craft a fastener for the suit to ensure it stays airtight! Should you run out of materials, I'm just a hop, skip, and a jump away!

dialogue.name: PROTECTINGWAY
dialogue.text: It would be wonderful if you could craft an airtight fabric for the suit─can't have it letting in the stray fungal matter, after all! Should you run out of materials, I'm just a hop, skip, and a jump away!

dialogue.name: PROTECTINGWAY
dialogue.text: It would be wonderful if you could craft an adhesive to ensure the suit remains airtight! Should you run out of materials, I'm just a hop, skip, and a jump away!

dialogue.name: PROTECTINGWAY
dialogue.text: When you've finished, please take the component to Managingway. I wish to implement it into the suit straightaway upon my return to the machining station!

dialogue.name: PROTECTINGWAY
dialogue.text: What's that? You've run out of materials? But... I clearly see you holding them right there!

dialogue.name: PROTECTINGWAY
dialogue.text: What's that? You've run out of materials? But... I clearly see you holding them right there!

dialogue.name: PROTECTINGWAY
dialogue.text: What's that? You've run out of materials? But... I clearly see you holding them right there!

dialogue.name: PROTECTINGWAY
dialogue.text: Run out of materials, have you? Not to worry, I've plenty more here.

dialogue.name: PROTECTINGWAY
dialogue.text: Run out of materials, have you? Not to worry, I've plenty more here.

dialogue.name: PROTECTINGWAY
dialogue.text: Run out of materials, have you? Not to worry, I've plenty more here.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Forename! How do matters fare with Protectingway?

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ah, I see you've already crafted the necessary material. If it were anyone else, I would be inclined to put this through several inspections─but I know we're in good paws with you. Protectingway will doubtless be thrilled.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Still, I wonder why she thought to create a protective suit. Rather than address a symptom of the problem, would it not be more effective to attack its source, and eradicate the infectious fungi in the first place?

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Well, it is not for me to question the dream of another. My thanks for your kind assistance!

obj.n: Parasital Infection Protection Suit Component Materials
